visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts area chart with the title 'Production, consumption and trade surplus of electrical power'. The chart should have three data series: 'Total production', 'Gross consumption', and 'Trade surplus'. The x-axis should display categories like 'Q1 2019', 'Q2 2019', etc., and the y-axis should be labeled 'TWh'. The chart should have a subtitle with a source link. The chart should not display credits. The chart should have a white background and a margin of 50 pixels on all sides.

title.text: Production, consumption and trade surplus of electrical power

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts configuration is designed to render an area chart with specific styling and data series. The chart type is set to 'area', which will display the data series as filled areas. The title of the chart is 'Production, consumption and trade surplus of electrical power', and it is aligned to the left. The subtitle includes a source link to SSB, also aligned to the left. The x-axis categories represent quarterly periods from Q1 2019 to Q3 2021, and the y-axis is labeled 'TWh'. The chart does not display credits. The data series include 'Total production', 'Gross consumption', and 'Trade surplus', each with corresponding data points. The chart has a white background and a margin of 50 pixels on all sides to ensure proper spacing. The labels and titles for both axes are styled with a dark color and specific font sizes for better readability.
